root.message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 16-7-1b, translated into en
root.data: The quality assessment is conducted based on the information provided in the reporting platform in an assessment of the metadata and statistics provided. When necessary and requested by the country the agency can support in designing a protocol for assessing the alignment of data produced with users’ needs, the compliance with guidelines in terms of computations, the timeliness of data production, the accessibility of statistics produced, the consistent use of methodology both in terms of geographic representation and through time, the coherence in terms of data production, and the architecture of data production.
